properties.Name: AccruedBenefitType
properties.Description:
The types of accrued benefit that can be "banked" over time.

Ex:
- Vacation
- Illness
- Bereavement
- Training

Columns.Name: AccruedBenefitTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a form of an Accrued Benefit Type.

Columns.Name: AccruedBenefitTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a form of an Accrued Benefit Type.

Columns.Name: AccruedBenefitTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a form of an Accrued Benefit Type.
